entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 4:15PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Altimeter Settings Could Exceed 31 Inches... Very strong high pressure building along the ALCAN Border tonight, combined with very cold temperatures, could cause altimeter settings to rise above 31.00 inches tonight and Tuesday over the Yukon Flats, and along the Yukon Valley upstream to Eagle and along the Porcupine River.
